dc:title: The Mystical Body and Spain
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Wants both sides in the Spanish Civil war to cease their fighting since all are Members of the Mystical Body of Christ. Appeals for prayer and reminds us we are to love our enemies.
